Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

The nuclear smoke devil is a superior variant of the smoke devil. It has a chance of spawning after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Weapons and armour

    • 1.9 Superior Slayer tertiary
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 References

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 305,977 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Nuclear smoke devil kill is worth 240,600.6.

The average Nuclear smoke devil kill while on a Konar task is worth 242,851.23.

There is an 18/128 chance of rolling the herb drop table. When the drop table is rolled, there is a 2/3 chance of dropping 1 herb and 1/3 chance of dropping 2 herbs leading to an average of 1.33 herbs per roll.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 February 2017
(update | poll)

The nuclear smoke devil was given a graphical update to be more distinguishable from their regular variant.
